EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
LIBYA.
DNC 08, DNC 09.
VESSEL, UNKNOWN PERSONS ON BOARD, CAPSIZED
AND ADRIFT IN 33-27N 012-24E AT 031445Z MAR.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 3906 5908 4527, 3906 5908 4409
FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
